en.title: FusionExcel Sponsors Malaysia Wheelchair Basketball 2009!
en.content:
REPORT SUBMITTED BY CHONG TUCK MENG, FOUNDER PEWIRA K9 ASSOCIATION.

FusionExcel successfully sponsored for the second year running, the Malaysian Wheelchair Basketball National League IV - Circuit Pahang 2009.

There are 6 teams from various states that participated in this competition.

Pahang being the host and organizer and the rest are from Melaka, Negeri Sembilan, Selangor, Kuala Lumpur and the National Junior Team Harimau Muda.

The program was officially opened by YB Dato' Hoh Khai Mun, EXCO Pahang and witnessed by Mr Azian Ali, the officer from the Ministry of Youth And Sports.

Negeri Sembilan emerged Champion followed by Pahang in 2nd place and the third place went to Selangor. Mrs Elizabeth Chong presented the prizes to the winners and souvenirs to a few NGOs who helped us organize the competition.

Once again, thank you very much FUSIONEXCEL INTERNATIONAL. Ahoo!... Ahoo!... Ahoo.!!!
